resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106472</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106472</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205992</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Figure This!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie Dieses Dar!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Figure Ceci !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Figure Isto!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcoli Questo!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογαριάστε αυτό!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Calcule Esto!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers interactive math problems families can use to help children understand estimation, volume, and other important mathematical concepts.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Problemfamilien der Angebote können interaktive pflegen, 
Kindern zu helfen, Schätzung, Datenträger und andere wichtige 
mathematische Konzepte zu verstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les familles interactives de problèmes de maths d'offres 
peuvent utiliser pour aider des enfants à comprendre l'évaluation, 
le volume, et d'autres concepts mathématiques importants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as famílias interativas dos problemas de math das ofertas
podem usar-se ajudar a crianças compreender o estimation, o volume, e
outros conceitos matemáticos importantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le famiglie interattive di problemi per la matematica di 
offerte possono usare aiutare i bambini a capire la valutazione, il 
volume ed altri concetti matematici importanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει τις διαλογικές οικογένειες προβλημάτων 
math μπορεί να χρησιμοποιήσει για να βοηθήσει τα παιδιά να 
καταλάβουν την εκτίμηση, την ένταση του ήχου, και άλλες 
σημαντικές μαθηματικές έννοιες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las familias interactivas de los problemas de matemáticas
de las ofertas pueden utilizar ayudar a niños a entender la 
valoración, el volumen, y otros conceptos matemáticos importantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205992</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106472</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/figure-this</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
